meanings.sent1: The small island was isolable from the mainland.
meanings.sent2: In the lab, the scientist discovered an isolable compound.
meanings.sent3: The isolable cookie in the jar tempted the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: Her isolable talent for painting shone brightly in the art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The isolable star twinkled alone in the night sky.

meanings.definition: Able to be separated from others.
meanings.sent1: The isolable cat preferred to roam alone in the garden.
meanings.sent2: During the hike, the trail led to an isolable clearing in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The isolable cloud drifted lazily away from the group.
meanings.sent4: His isolable thoughts kept him company in solitude.
meanings.sent5: The isolable flower stood out among the crowded garden.

meanings.sent1: The isolable book on the shelf caught her attention.
meanings.sent2: The isolable house at the end of the street had a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent3: The isolable pen rolled away from the rest of the stationery.
meanings.sent4: His isolable laughter echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The isolable tree stood proudly in the open field.
